title: Mind & Body Information Hub
author: Health Editorial Team
description: Our minds and bodies can benefit from a variety of health modalities, including meditation, healthy living habits, complementary medicine, and more.
cleaned_text: At Health, we take a holistic approach to wellness, which means focusing on the mind and body connection and how one impacts the other. Read more about the latest stories on mental health, self-care, complementary medicine, and more.
